doc:
Stuart Paton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stuart_Paton 0 Stuart Paton (23 July 1883 – 16 December 1944) was a British director, screenwriter and actor of the silent era. He directed 67 films between 1915 and 1938. He also wrote for 24 films between 1914 and 1927. Despite a sizable list of credits, Paton was never well-regarded, especially as a director. He was born in Glasgow, Scotland and died in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles. He was married to actress Ethel Patrick. His remains are buried at Chapel of the Pines Crematory. Stuart_Paton ( 23_July_1883 – 16_December_1944 ) was a_British_director , screenwriter_and_actor of the_silent_era . He directed 67_films between 1915_and_1938 . He also wrote for 24_films between 1914_and_1927 . Despite a_sizable_list of credits , Paton was never_well-regarded , especially_as a_director . He was_born in Glasgow , Scotland and died in Woodland_Hills , Los_Angeles . He was_married to actress_Ethel_Patrick . His_remains are_buried at Chapel of the_Pines_Crematory .
